column5: Anyone have a report for the walleye action near the Clearwater/White Otter Lake area? Heading up on Aug. 8th...
Just got back in town last night 7/24. The lake was like the dead sea. Only caught 14 walley's all week between 4 guys. Maybe we shouldn't have been trolling with dare devils.What do you think ?
You should have headed for the Seine River (south toward Atikokan). We fish the Seine River, Marmion and Dashua two trips each year. Right now your best bet would be the river up from Marmion.
Have you heard of any reports for smallies? If so, what lure worked the best?
